Rant Why am i typing?? i have no clue, other than i love the sound that this keyboard makes. its so cool!!!! but its really sensitive and the backspace is like, way over there and its small so i keep hitting the backslash accidentally, haha. im so bored. i need something to dew. my skewl site is down, so no skewl today either. and theres absolutley no one online on my laptop. stupid ppl that actually go to skewl. they make me cry. jessica dyed my hair RED, not purple, RED *sulks* stupid colour-blind pplz!!! *coughcoughBYRONcough* speaking of whom hes coming over after skewl today as far as i know. thats not very far, but still, i know wat i mean....i think.....meh. i love this program! no lil squggles under the words that are spelled wrong!! no spellcheck!!! i can dew WATEVA I WANT!!! MUAHAHAHA!! lol, i scare me sumtimes. owell. im too used to msn, i keep pressing enter when im done a sentence, lol. im such a freak. how am i ever gonna get this to my blog if im over here??? im on the wrong comp to be dewing this.....owell,. ill find a way. Hey!!! my heat died!!! *cries* i want it back!!!! not fair!!!! =( =( actually, no i dont want it back, its really really really hot in this room. the temp was sposed to DROP so what does dad dew? he turns the heat WAAAAAAAYYYYYY up. *dies* x.x U know wat? im fucking sick and tired of my father calling me a goddamned lier (woah, that was a topic change.) but i am. every day hell say something, and ill remind him of it later and hell be like i never said that! dont lie to me, i dont want u to lie to me, be honest, ur such a little lier, etc, etc. It gets really really annoying. and they wunder y i like Adam's Song by Blink 182. "I never thought Id die alone, I'll laff the loudest, whod have known?" "I'm too depressed to go on, ull be sorry when im gone." they suc shit if they dont see how well that fits my life. i have like no friends anymore, but thats ok, that dont really bugg me that much. what does is that the friends that i have laff when they hear me complain about my father. I know hes like stupid and insane and shit, but its really really annoying when ppl tell u to let out ur feelings and not keep them all bottled in, but then u tell them whats bugging u and theyre all like 'oh hes just crazy' or 'hes an asshole' and then they change the subject. u know, ppl say that when kids grow up wiht ppl putting them down all the time, they grow up to be abusive....does almost trying to put ur fist thru a wall count as abusive? i wunder if the changer left a bruise where he hit me with it.....or when he pushed me for that matter...owell, too late, theyd be gone by now, that shit was like last week. this week there could be fists involved for all i know. i dont really care anymore. its all shit. hey, my heat is back, yay. my life sux. someone kill me. im such a fucking loser, everyone thinks im always so happy and shit, but i never really am. id kill myself, but a)im a loser and im a chicken cuz i hate pain b)that would just prove to dad that hes right, and hed be a lot happier without me around c)i dont think that it would go over too well with my friends. Byron was all suicidal b4 i met him, and he found this quote thingie. it said something along the lines of 'suicide is not a choice, it is what happens when pain overcomes resources for coping with pain.' well guess what, there is always a choice. always. and if i ever was gonna commit suicide, then it would be my choice. even adams song says so "the choice was mine i didnt think enuf". im like obsessed with that song. but yeah, it would be my choice, and the more time goes by the worse my father acts, and the better that choice seems. look at it this way. If u grew up with a nice father, and mother, and a big brother, but then ur brother moved out, then got in trouble witht he cops and hadda move back in, then ur father starts forgetting shit, small things, then big huge fucking IMPORTANT things, and ur mother was in the hospital, ur father almost dies cuz hes to stubborn to take his ass to the hospital when he has double pneumonia, ur mother starts having heart palpitations from all the fucking stress at home and work, ur mother also decides to go for surgery, having u worried half to death, she has a few breakdowns, u have a few breakdowns, ur father buggz every single one of ur friends that walks into the house, and then buggz u all day every day when theyre gone, at skewl, y arent they here?? y dont ur friends come over??? they should be here helping u with this or that. i HATE it, y cant he just leave me alone???? its sooo damned annoying. then again, mom also dropped a bit of a bomb on me a while ago. i knew that when daves dad left she took dave and went out west looking for him. appairently she found him. but it didnt dew any good. so. they came back to guelph and settled in. then dad met mom, and they moved in together. now. heres the thing. my father is a fucking ass control freak. you wouldnt believe the shit that he does. if im not home right on time he sends mom out to drive around and look for me. then he gives me an hour long lecture about y i shouldnt be late. if im not up right when he sayz in the morning, i get screamed and bitched at to get my 'fat ass outta that bed' and how ill never be a vet if i cant get out of bed in the morning. well guess what shit head, i will get out of bed when i fucking want to, i dont need some gay ass fucking old man to tell me when to wake up. if i have ot get outta bed for something, i will, but if theres no reason to and i havent been sleeping well, then FUCK OFF. i cant listen to the music i like unless its so quiet that he cant hear it, and its such a small house that if HE cant hear it then neither can i!!!!! jesus. it pisses the shit outta me, i like the music that i like, and i dont care if no one else in this house does. ill listen to it as loud as i want when im in my room, i dont care if u can hear it. if theres a song i like on tv and i turn it up for ONE song, then piss off and let me hear it!!! if i dont dew everything his way, then i get bitched at and threatened. like litterally, threatened. like 'im gonna blast ur fat face off if u dont....' litterally, hes said that. i get called a bitch, a fat slob, an asshole, a jackass, a stupid idiot, a loser, a lier, etc, etc. well anywayz, , the piont is that he was MORE controlling when he was living with my mother b4 i was born and they were married. well. mom got really pissed at his controllingness and she took david and went to grammas for like a week, and told dad to get his stuff out and go. which he did. and that was good. well, he weaseled his way back by helping out with little things, staying for supper, he got snowed in once and slept on the couch, and eventually, he and mom were back together. then there was me, and they got married. mom told me that shes thought of just taking me and leaving, which i dont have any problem with, none whatsoever, but we cant go anywhere. we cant go to grammas cuz mom promised not to drop her kids there, that shed sort out her own problems. we cant stay anywhere in guelph, or with anyone that dad knows, cuz hed forget the reason that we left and would be calling all over guelph looking for us. mom wouldnt stay with any family at all, im sure. and im not allowed to verbally tell anyone this, but like, she wants me to keep stuff bottled in, but she tells me not too, a bit of a conflicting message there. moms been getting some information shit at her work and shes taken my father to the doctors office, and they think that either hes had a mild stroke or hes getting alzheimers, so hes going in for a CT scan sumtime. i really dont care. that sorta scares me, cuz i usta love hanging out with dad and fooling around and going places, but now i just dont care at all. i dont think mom loves him. she doesnt seem to. things that he does that she used to ignore, she now expresses her disgust almost as clearly as i dew. theres something going on that i dont know about too. mom came out to the car crying last saturday and she cried for the whole drive to the barn, and ten minutes after we were there, but she wouldnt tell me what was wrong. i still cant figure it out, and i dont wanna press her for anything cuz then ill get yelled at. dad keeps calling her an asshole and a bitch too, and then he calls ME more stuff if i try to stand up for her. they had a fight on the way to the doctors office and also IN the docs office, but i still dont know what about. They fight about me a lot of the time. how everything i dew is bad or wrong and how everything is my fault. How im so much worse then my father's other kids, and how shitty i act, and how im such a frreak cuz i dont go to highskewl like the rest of my friends. theyve been fighting about a lot of other stuff too, but i dont know what all because they keep their voices fairly low. sometimes. ive been being a huge chicken and running over to jessicas house when things get bad. we'll go out for subs or whatever, and ill be able to forget (or pretend to forget) all the crap thats been going on. (I'm getting pretty damn good at pretending all sorts of dhit, i dew it often enuf. pretemd my life isnt shit, pretend my parents dont fight, pretend that i still have a lot of friends, pretend that im happy all the time, pretend that things dont bother me...but anywayz...) We spend litterally almost entire days walking around guelph. just walking around, not really dewing anything. I had to go home early from her house a few times too becuase some asshole called like five billion times while i was still asleep, wanting to know where i was!!! wunder who THAT coulda been. yeesh. ive gone home once too cuz dad called linda frangoes (family friend) for some reason, and on the fone, he broke down and started crying and muttering sumthing about mom. from what she could understand, which wasnt a lot, he was totally convinced that mom was out with another guy. that she was cheating on him. he would not accept the fact that she was at WORK. so linda foned mom at work and told her what was going on, and she went home early and so i had too to. hes such an asshole cuz apairently hes thought this for quite a while. my mom is not a slut, nomatter what he thinks. hes such a fucking GAYLORD!!!! arg. i keep calling him shit here cuz i cant in real life or hed either punch me in the face, or bitchslap me, not sure which. u know what? tylonal doesnt hurt. neither does ibuprofine. ill keep those in mind, theyre both almost new bottles.

Cards Know what? I hate card games. I hate Solitaire, Hearts, Freecell, I even hate Minesweeper...wait a sec, there aren't any cards in that! owell, I still hate it. *lil voice grins smugly 'that's cuz u can never wn any of them'* Damn right!! Went with Jess and we met Laura, Byron, and Chris there. we really didnt dew much...*singing* (dont ask) k, well, my typing skills have greatly diminished since i started this, so imma gonna leave now. Luvz ya, buh byez!!!

ARRRG! Thanx so much to all my friends that read that and couldnt give half a shit. i sure dew love u all. jezus christ. my life sux. i get braces monday. fuck life, bye.

UNGROUNDED!!! MUAHAHAHAHA!!! IM FREE!!!!!!! i lurv it!! haha.im ok, i swear, i hadda dohnut for brekkie this mornin, so, yeah, im HYPER!! hehe, my father almost socked me in the face the other day, i just stood there smiling. (he pushed me outta the way and i pushed him back so he got pissed.) and I GOT TO GO SEE THE HORSES AGAIN YESTERDAY!!! me and jess were riding for like 8 hours again, it was fun! She ALMOST got me to gallop fast, but i didnt. jess says that i only cantered fast, but i think i was galloping slowly. We were dewing a lot of jumping too, it was cool, other than we ride in a western roping saddle (its like 50 friggin pounds!!!) and when u jump u get the horn in ur belly a LOT, lol. Anywayz, we also rode Ponyta a lot. ppl who know me know how short i am, well, Ponyta only comes up to like my hips! shes so cute....cept when she rears and bucks trying to throw ppl off. lol. she got jess off and jess was right underneith her!!! =S it was unnerving cuz i hadda ride her after that! "we" had to muck out a stall that was litterally ALL horse crap, over a foot deep!! i was the only one who ended up dewing any of it tho, and i got 2 wheelbarrows full from only a little sqaure of it that got done!!!=S. anywayz, we rode right thru a thunderstorm, it was fun, hehe. WE TURNED PONYTA INTO A PUNK PONY!!! well, I turned her into a punk pony anywayz. I braided her mane, which is SUPER thick and its like parted down the middle, so its real thick on both sides of her neck, and since her forelock is SOO thick, i couldnt braid it, so i put it up in like a ponytail, but it went POOF and it looked punk, it was SWEET!! haha! so anywayz, i gotta go now, im going riding again, but this is my english saturday lesson, so...yeah, fun. anywayz, ill talk later, luvz yaz, buh byez! *little voice continues snoring....*

Bored...Lalala There is nothing to dew, nothing at all. I hate being grounded, there's too much time for skewlwork and when ur done that theres nothing left to dew but complain about how bored u are to everyone, and then they all get mad and leave or block u and uve got absultively nuthin after that. *"thats cuz ur annoying and boring"* i am not!! *"u are so!!"* fine then, be that way!! *stalks off leaving little voice behind* *"Sheesh, some ones in a grouchy mood today!" lil voice sayz as he picks self up off of ground and dusts self off* hmmph! well anywayz, ... yeah. *"ur dewing it again!!"* dewing...? *"being BORING!!"* oh. thats nice. Lauras gettin her hair chopded off at 4:15 today, lol. she was home sick today and ive been yackin at her. i get to go get ortho history dun on thurs cuz i need to get a 12 yr molar pulled if i want a slightly normal smile. so theyre gonna take a bunch of xrays and moulds and stuff and its gonna take an hour. i unno when the actual braces are going on tho, but to get the rays and that done is gonna be $500.00!!!!!!!!!!! *dies* *"YAY!!"* *comes back to life just to annoy little voice* *"awww!!" goes off and cries in a corner* aww!! owell. ill comfort him lata. nywayz, i should go now, ppl are complaining that my blog is already too long, so luvz yaz, buh byez!! *goes over to comfort little voice*

Grounded Me an Jess and Byron went to the forum skating, which was pretty fun, we all hadda good time. I kinda pissed mom off with my music tho. She was a lil late coming to get us, (she was at my Aunt's house visiting) but that was ok, we played on the snowmound. She finaly came and me an Jess were trying to convince mom to let By sleep on the couch and me and jess could sleep in my room. But of course, that was a definite no. (Quite a while ago me and jess had promised by that he could sleep over when we got the 8Mile dvd, which we now have.) Anywayz, mom said no and was getting a bit pissed at me again, so Jess decided we should go for a walk when we got home. I told my father that we were going for a walk around the block, and we left. Well we went to the end of the street, and yeah, he missed the bus. So we went down to Sleeman park cuz I didnt really wanna go home and he could just catch the next bus. But when we figured it all out, he would have missed that bus too cuz it takes a while to get to the busstop from where we were. So we stayed at the park for a while till I figured that my parents would be out looking for me and I got really freaked out cuz I knew theyd be really mad. So Jess got real nervous cuz we were standing right in the light, so we hadda go to near the trees where it was dark, which made Byron really nervous cuz in SA apparently ppl get jumped all the time. We were all pretty nervous by then, with no real reason. I was afraid of going home to my parents, Byron was afraid that we were gonna get jumped, and Jessica was afraid that my parents were gonna find us. Well anywayz, I was really upset cuz I knew how mad my parents were gonna be. So we decided that we were gonna go to Jessica’s house instead of mine. We had to go back to the skewl at the end of my street, down the other catwalk, down a dark street full of trees, which By didnt like again, it freaked me out too, and then we changed our minds and went a diff way cuz we were trying to avoid Cannon hill since we'd be seen really easy up there. The street we took anywayz still went past it, but it was the bottom, so it wasnt as bad. We were all sooo jumpy and it felt like a horror movie. Well anywayz, we were gonna go straight to Jessica’s house, but we figured that my parents might be there already, so we walked down paisley and went thru paisley rd skewl which has no lights whatsoever in its playground and it scared the shit outta me. Then we hadda get thru Goldie park which was not fun cuz its not lit very well either and its right beside the gravel pits and train trax, so a lot of mesed up ppl hang out there and it was like midnight almost (11:30 or so) when we were there. My parents werent AT Jessica’s house, but they had called, so I called back and my father said that I could stay there for the night. well mom came back anywayz, cuz my father neglected to tell her that I had actually called after all and she took me and Byron and dropped by off at home, and I got home and came on MSN, just kinda trying not to talk to anyone at home, but mom came in and was like interrogating me, and yelling at me and shit and I didnt know what to say and she basically wouldnt stop yelling so I basically broke down crying which was seriously very pathetic of me. I swear Im on the verge of a freaking nervous breakdown!!! Its either my father or my mother, and now i have nowhere to go if i have to leave cuz Jess's mom made it pretty clear that she didnt want my problems. I feel so bad for dragging Jessica and Byron into all this. We shoulda jus let him take his bus and let me be yelled at anywayz and then Jess's mom would still be fine with it all. But I was a wimp and decided not to dew anything right, as usual, and i got everyone riled up for nothing basically. At the time it seemed like a big deal not to go home, thats how fucking scared i was, but looking back now, i can see that i was just being a jackass and i dragged other ppl into it that didnt have to be there. im going to go beat myself up about this now, im not talkint to my mother, shes grounded me, Jess and By arent allowed near the house (Byron especially) and i cnat go out for lunch this week. well, i might be able to, but not likely. anywayz, ill write more later, maybe my mood will lighten up, im not making any promised tho, considering the fact that I cried myself to sleep last night reallllly late and now im supreemly grouchy. Byez.

Serious Note That should likely be semi-serious, but I just dont think that i can get enough energy to deal with that little voice, so i shoved him in a box for now. mebbe ill let him out lata....mebbe not....its all good =) K, everyone knows about the war thats going on, right? if u dont then ur more dense than me, and thats seriously hard to dew. well thats buggin me becasue i have a LOT of family that are going to have to leave for the war if they start enrolling ppl. Theres also the deal with this SARS thing. For those of u who dun listen to the news that much, SARS is a respiratory ailment that gives ppl a really high fever and a dry cough. and the catch is that its DEADLY!!! there have been over 100 cases in toronto already, and 6 ppl have died from it so far there. Most of the skewls in toronto have been put under quarentine and they have to wear masks at all times to keep from spreading it to other ppl. they arent even all that sure that its spread by close contact, they think that it might be airborn now, if so, then there might be a LOT more ppl that should be quarentined that arent yet. there was even a person from the guelph general hospital that was moved becuz it was suspected that they had SARS, so now theyre closing all the hospitals in guelph for visitors and ppl checking in unless its really neccisary. (Guelph General, St. Josephs, Homewood.) and my mommy works at St Joes and yeah, if its closed down from suspicsion of SARS in the general, shouldnt i be a bit worried about her? they dont even have the medical masks to wear yet to keep from getting it!!! Well, while im on the subject of stuff thats stupid, annoying, scarey, or pisses me off, lets talk about the asshole idiot that i live with. he practiacally busted the fucking table cuz byron wouldnt move to the other side of the table right away. he didnt know that he was being told to move. father was worried that byron was going to ruin of hurt our video camera in some way shape or form, and i said that he was fine to sit there, and he said no he wasnt, so he ended up ordering byron to move, which seemed to confuse the hell out of him, and it got me mad cuz it really dont metter where the hell he sits!! so i tried to tell that to my father, but all he did was get really pissed and slam his fist doen on the table. so now im pissed at him. i was gonna slam mine down too, but i dont know what he would have done back to me it i had, so i didnt. i think that im going to be mean to my little voice and keep him in that box because i just dont love him enough to let him out. =) i think thats all that i have to complain about, meh, mebbe ill think of sumthin lata, lol. Luvz yaz!! Buh byez!!!

Bored laura talked me into updating this cuz im really bored and theresd nothing to dew. my spelling is crap cuz its like midnight, and im really tired, but im touch typing cuz its too dark to see the keys. y am i up so late? im such a messed up freak. owell, its all good =) anywayz, the time on these entries are all wrong cuz laura i dont think set me to the right time zone when she created this blog for me, haha. owell, do i care that much??? uhm....nope =) i cant think of anything to talk about now!! its so sad!! owell, a short entry cant hurt lol. looking at the length of the rest of this id say that im really glad that i can type fast, haha. anywayz, i think that im going to go to bed now. Luvz yaz!! Buh byez!!

MY TRIP!!! Part One - On The Road Day 1 Tee hee, im on my way to ALBERTA!! yay!! go me!! *ahem* ok, ok, i AM ok. a lil excited tho. ok, well...today was Sunday, June 8, 2003, and we were supposed to have gone to a Tunney family reunion thingie. We erm...started on our way! but then we uhm...kinda........got lost.....lol. we couldn't find Jane St. in TO....sooo....yeah. well i wasnt the one that was navigating, so it wasnt MY fault! then again, i didnt really help that much...i kinda....slept *grins widely and looks angelic* well anywayz....an hour - hourandahalf long trip ended up being...uhhh...like 3 hours or so, hence me sleeping. well ppl got annoyed enough that we couldnt find the place that we just tuned around and came back home for a few minutes. we werent very long because we needed to just call shane or dave and see if one of them could come pick us up from the airport in TO on the 21st @ 6:30 in the morning =S (our flight leaves at 1AM!!!!! but we got a good rate =) plus its mommy's bday!! =D ) so anywayz, daves gon pick us up. then we went to the library and it of course wasnt open coz its sunday. so we went to zellers, and GUESS WUT I GOT?!?!?! I HAVE A CELL FONE!!!! =D=D=D=D=D wheeeeee!! ...unfortunately....i dont exactly have the internet at the moment, so i cant go online to get a # for it. when i do, ill post this entry and get my # and post it too. eminemyways...uhm...after that we got subs and went to grammas, and it was storming and it was awsome....we ate supper....we went to bed....well....they all went to bed, i typed...in fact i should go, ill try to write about every day, so jess, ur gonna have a LOT to read...i prolly wont write this much tho, if i can help it. Night all! Day 2 Well, we got up at like six and were outta grammas by like...quarter after seven. we had brekkie, made sure we had everything and we were gone. well, we drove a LOT...i was stuck in the very back seat, and i got feeling pretty icky coz im not usually that great with long rides. i was ok tho, if anyone cares *little voice looks dissappointed* i slept for a while and then i was awake, but feeling a little better as long as u dont count the fact that i couldnt move my neck very well (it hadda crick *owie*) nywayz, we stopped and i took half a gravol and was great for the rest of the day. i also changed seats and i wasnt so bad. i think i was just getting used to the van. we passed some pretty amazing scenery! there were all these sheer rock walls that were streaked thru wit colours from the layers of the rock! it was awsome coz the highway went right thru em and u could see where they had jammed the rods thru to break off the rocks. we also saw a lot of swamp and some of Lake Superior. we got lost trying to find the b&b and of course, i was asleep again. Id been helping gramma crochet an afghan, gimme a break!! but we found it, then went to get supper, and we stopped at a park that was reaaalllly pretty, lots of picnic tables and a playground and swings and a pavillion and everything, but there were blackflies EVERYWHERE!!! they were SO thick! it was icky and bloody and justjustjust....*shudders* but then we went and got coffee (iced cap for me! =D) and i also got KFC popcorn chicken!! *drool* OMG i fergot how GOOD that stuff is!!! but yeah, then we came back to the bed and breakfast and read and talked a bit. they have a reallly cute doggie named Missy. shes such a sweety!!! she gives kisses, lol. but nywayz, we all took showers and went to bed. im on the floor beside mom, but the thing is that ive been touch typing the whole thing coz i didnt think that it was fair to keep them up with the light as bright as the one beside the bed. well nywayz, i should go, brekkie is @ 7 tomorrow morning and then we be outtie. (its like quarter to 11 now) ill try to be online if i can find a place along the way, but there is no way that i can garuntee it. not that it really matters seeing as ur not gonna be reading this till i find somewhere nywayz! =P well, i only wrote a lot coz its the first travelling night. btw, the b&b is just outside sault st marie =) we drove about seven or eight hours today, lol. were hoping to break manitoba by either tomorrow or the next day, and from there itll be smooth sailing, lol. gnight yall! luvz yaz!! Day 3 Well, we got thru Thunder Bay today, which was purty good. we'll be outta ontario by tomorrow afternoon sometime. =D. we're at a motel outside dryden at the moment, and they dont have internet either *bawls eyes out* omg, i miss my msn!!!! all my friends!! and i cant call them coz i need the net to get my cell #!!!!!!!! *sighs loudly* well nywayz, weve all got the same room this time, and my fathers putting up a fuss about it. not that i really care, its all good here, lol. we saw some AMAZING scenery, but most of it was past by the time i thought to get my camera out! i did get a few nice ones tho, and a few panoramics =) not sure how well theyre gonna turn out tho, coz i took em all thru the windows...so...yeah. we did stop in thunder bay to see the Terry Fox memorial statue. it was really really cool! lol, they were painting the fence and they had signs everywhere that said "WET PAINT" and ppl were telling my father to watch out, but the smart one almost leaned against it anywayz. but yeah....i wasnt gonna write much, lol, so ill go for now, we hafta be outta here by 11, but i may just go out and sleep in the frigging car because my fathers being an ass. well ill try to get online soon, luvz yaz!! Day 4 IM IN MANITOBA!!! WE MADE IT OUTTA ONTARIO!! lol. there are so many mixed licence plates here! theres like the ppl next door in this motel are from South Dakota, and theres ppl from saskatchewan, and ohio, and ontario, and alberta, and EVERYWHERE! tee hee. well nywayz, i thought that it was rather sad this morning coz yesterday we passed a whoooollle big huge area that had been burnt down in a forest fire, and today we saw a LOT of clear cutting. stupid frigging loggers *even little voice mutters under its breath* but nywayz, we got to manitoba around eleven i think in the morning, im not sure coz there was a time change either yesterday or today, but i didnt really pay attention to it. my comp sayz that its 11:22 right now, but the alarm clock sayz that it is 10:24 so...yeah. were gonna be going thru another time zone soon, and we were hoping to get to Edmonton by tomorrow, but gramma and grampa figgered that it would take at least 11 hours straight of driving. it was weird today, my father decided that he was getting out of the car for some reason and he opened the door as if he was about to get out, but heres the thing....WE WERE STILL ON THE HIGHWAY!! arrrg, so mom (who was driving at the time) pulled over coz he was really confused and aggitated and all sortsa crap and he got out and actually RAN away!!=S it was scary, i dont think ive EVER seen him run.....ever! owell, he was messed, so my moms really p.o.-ed at him for that and shes not feeling very well either, her tummy's sore. i got her to take half of one of my gravol tho, and shes asleep now, but the light's still on so i dont wanna be too long. lol, i get to sleep on a cot! arent i special!! *"Ur a reject!!" little voice pipes up* errrm....well theres that too....but *SHHH*! eminemywayz....I MISS YOU ALL!!! IT MAKES ME SAD!!!! I HAVE NO INTERNET YET!!! *bursts into tears* i still dont have the # for my cell yet either....sooo...yeah....well nywayz, i should go, i need to get a bit of sleep coz were getting up at 6 tomorrow, were kinda in the middle of manitoba i think and were gonna try to get as close as we can to Edmonton tomorrow, but i hope we dont actually get there, coz gramma called and cancelled our reservations for the first night. now...if my father hadn't have jumped outta the van and gone running, then we might have made it on time *glares at sleeping father* well nywayz, i luvz yaz!!! buh byez!!!! o yeah, one sec, lol, it be Wednesday, June 11, 2003, and it be my fathers birthday *half heartedly wishes him happy bday* and it also be gramma and grampas wedding aniversery!!!!=D *cheers, jumps for joy, brings them a huge cake and wishes them a very very happy anniversery* we had a nice dinner at the motel restaurant to celebrate, but since we havent been eating a lot on the road, and mom wasnt feeling well, we didnt end up finishing all of the food, so weve got a HUGE cinnamin bun and half of a small pizza still to eat, lol, it was good tho. nywayz, im actually gonna go now =P LUV YAZ!!! *waves* wait wait wait, i was also gonna say that the praries ARE really really flat, but i dont think that theyre boring..but meh....ok, im gonna GO this time, lol, NIGHTZ! Day 5 AHHHH!!! IM IN ALBERTA!!! MUAHAHAHA!!! lmao, this is SWEET!! we made it after all!! it was purty sweet. we saw a buncha buffalo when we first got here. (btw, saskatchewan is kinda boring, i slept almost all morning, lol) we got lost another 2 times, but i was AWAKE for them!!! yay! lol, yeah, we took a wrong turn once and then we got lost trying to get to the hotel, we hadda pull into a truck place near the trainyard and a driver there was gonna give us directions, but he basically escorted us there instead! *"ur not special enough for an escort" lil voice mumbles* owell, i am now *smiles* well nywayz, I HAVE INTERNET NOW!!!! I LOVE YOU ALL, IMMA EMAIL EVERYONE!!!!AHHH!! ok, ok, but that will be tomorrow morning. tonight its really late and Lena (my cousin) is sleeping w/ me on the pull out couch in the hotel room coz her rooms really crowded wit pplz. i tried to get the # for my fone, but theres sumthing frigged wit that comp and it wouldnt lemme dew it, so imma hafta ask them if it might be possible at all, and mebbe they can fix it. so hopefully ill get a # soon and i can call u all!! (not that ur gonna see this for a while yet nywayz...but owell =) andandandandandandomgomgomgomgomg*hyperventalates* I AM GOING TO THE WEST EDMONTON MALL TOMORROW MORNING SOMETIME!!! =D=D=D=D=D OMGOMGOMGOMGOMG!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! *takes a breath* I CANT WAIT!!!! WATER PARK!!! ROLLER COASTER!!! STORES!!!! SHOPPING!!! WHEEEEEEEE!!! *takes another breath* *ahem* aiighty, i think im ok now =) nywayz, i should get going before my father flips out again and starts yelling at me to get off the comp. I LOVE YOU ALL!!!!! NIGHT NIGHTZ!!! Part 2 - At Edmonton Day 6 omg, where to begin?!?!! wow!! ok, well, i spent like the entire day at the West Edmonton Mall, and it is AWESOME!!! its friggin HUGE!!! i LOVE it!!! i spent like 60 bucks and mom got back like $1.80 somethin, lol. butbutbut yeah, that place is friggin AMAZING!! ive got the starter kit for my cell fone, so imma get that activated tomorrow, and ill have to email the # to yall. tee hee, we got there and basically the first thing that i did was run for chapters, so i got a new book. well then i went to HMV, which is like 2 doors down right under famous players, and i got ANOTHER cd, (i got 2 on the road, dixie chicks and good charlotte) and now i got Linkin Park - Meteora. so i was happy, lol. we took a look at the water park, but i didnt feel much like going in because i dont do well on waterslides, lol, i end up half falling off the edges =S. but nywayz, we took a look, and then we went around the mall a few times and MAN! its a LONG walk!!!! lmao its sooooo big. well, we eventually got around upstairs and down a lil bit, and we looked at the dolphins. they made me soo sad, the poor lil things were in a tiny enclosement thing and it was too small for them. it wasnt even very deep, but it had a thing where u could go below and see them down there, like in free willy, and it was so strange, i just really didnt like it for some reason. well nywayz, breckon and clinton went to see 2 fast 2 furious, and we went mall trolling, and we also took a while to find the food court, but we got there and ate, and the amusement park was right there!!! =D=D OMFG, I LOVE THAT PLACE!!! most of the rides at first from the food court are for lil kids, but me and lena went on the big swing thingie. yes jess, the same one that almost made me sick at sportsworld. nywayz, i was fine this time, it was sooo much fun, lol. butbutbut, OMFG OMFG OMFG!! *freaks out* if nyone reading this has ever been to the West Edmonton Mall, or seen pics of Galaxyland, then u might have seen the Mindbender. its a fucking HUGE roller coaster, the only 3 loop indoor roller coaster in the WORLD!! k, now, if u know me, u know that a) imma chicken and that b) ive never been on a roller coaster b4. well, the Mindbender was a doosie to start off with!!! holy CRAP! i can NOT believe that i went on that damn thing!!!!!!!!! butbutbut I LOVED IT!! ill likely have whiplash from it, but i dont care, it was worth it!! when i saw the whole thing i told lena that i wasnt gonna go on it, and she said that i had to, so i did, lol. auntie shelley went on it too!!!!! lol, i screamed the whole way *blushes* I TOLD U IMMA CHICKEN!!! lol it was SOO much fun tho!!! i have a souveneir from it too, a great big bruise on my arm from the safety thingie that goes over ur shoulders. but now that i think about it, maybe that makes me lucky....i mean when i think about it...today was friday the 13th...i rode the last run b4 a mantenance check...its a full moon...my first time on a coaster....owell, i LOVED it. the pics dont do it justice tho, the thing is GIANT! and i left my cameras at the hotel, so i couldnt get a pic of it, and i didnt have the money to get them to take a pic of me, lol, it cost 2 bucks and i didnt have that much at the time. but MAN i wanna go do that again!! the first drop is the worst, and the g-force is evil, it snapped my head down b4 each loop and i couldnt get it back up =S not till the upside-down bit of the loop anywayz. but yeah, im still so surprised that i actually did that!! lol. nywayz, then we lost everyone coz we thought we were going swimming, then we werent, then ppl came back to look for bathingsuits in the car, and then they left and appairently told us to meet them by the whale, (a statue near the door where we came in), but we didnt coz we thought that they were coming back to get us, and i at least knew my way around the mall...how i knew, i dont know, coz i cant for the life of me find my way around gcvi, and i think that the skewl is just an itty bit smaller then that mall, lol. but w/e the reason, i went off to the water park, which is literally from one end of the mall at the food court, to the other end of the mall =S its soo long, lol, the mall takes up like 2 city blocks =S lol. but yeah, we found ppl and got straightened around and then we made dinner plans, gramma and grampa and auntie shelley and her kids hadda go to a special dinner at the church and we werent invited, so we had supper with uncle blake and auntie christine, and matt and adam, at the old spaghetti house. the food there is SOOOOOOO good!!! mmmmm *nummyfulls* lol. so then we went to get my cell fone starter package and once we got that we tried to find a timmies, but we couldnt find it so we gave up and i chose a card for tessa (the one thats getting married and the reasont that were out here, lol) and then we met uncle blake who took us back to the hotel, which is only like 2 blocks away from the mall, and he went back to stay with auntie christine and matt and adam. so weve kinda been hanging out here, and its been ok....uncle dennis and aunt carol are here now too along with arri and tamen. omg, has arri ever CHANGED!! i didnt recognize him at all, lol, and he like gave me a hugg and all i was thinking was 'who the hell are you?!?!?' lol. they went to a movie tho, so we really didnt see much of them. clint and breck were asleep...so we didnt see them either, but uncle richard is here and he brought al-key-hol wit him, lol. his brother david is here too. but yeah, it was a REALLLLLLLLYY long day, so i should get going now. ILL TALK TO U ALL AS SOON AS I CAN, I THINK IMMA SEND MORE EMAILS OUT TOMORROW!!!! =D oh yeah, and i might be going to bc!!! mom wants me to see the mountains, so we may take a lil day trip out that way and take a lookie. well nywayz, i hope to be on the internet later, so buh byez!!!! loves yaz!! night night!! Day 7 - THE WEDDING!! well, today was the wedding and i started out the day by reading like 2 whole books, then i went downstairs to go on the comp and i emailed the ppl back that loved me enough to email me =D. there wasnt too many of u....=S nywayz, then i came back upstairs and i started getting ready for the wedding. it was raining out and i think i that it was because they did the pictures b4 the wedding, so the groom saw the bride in her dress b4 the wedding, which is bad luck. but it cleared up nicely during the cermony, which was beautiful btw. it was really long tho, but i liked it. we mingled for a bit and then we went back to our hotel (which, by the way, is called the Executive Royal Inn) for the reception, which was really funny, they had comedy pplz come in but they were phil's and tessa's friends, lol. phil is really funni too, lol. (there were lotza embarrassing stories told for both the groom and the bride, tee hee.) then they hadda spin the Wheel-O-Love lol. it was different ways that they hadda kiss. then they had their first dance as a married couple and then everyone danced, excluding me...i was a wallflower, as usual. and then we had pics taken, and then me and lena and hali went upstairs to play cards for a while. erin was gonna come wit us, but she didnt i guess....i unno.....well, lenas still here and shes waiting for me to play cards wit her still even tho its 1 in the morning here, lmao. weve gotta be checked out @ 11 tomorrow morning and weve got a big present opening thingie at 10, but i dun really wanna go...nywayz, ill check my email if i get another chance and if nyone else loves me enough to email me then ill email them back, i want my msn!!! lol, nywayz, i should go now, ttyl!!! Feeling Okay, i think that i am offically going insane. I dont know what I feel anymore because it doesnt seem like i feel anything. ppl who have known me for a really long time know that i used to adore my father. he used to be the sun the moon and the stars. and now it makes me sick to my stomach to think that i used to think that way. The only feeling that i can dredge up for him is a very strong sence of hatred, which i need a stronger word for....loathing maybe? and a small shard of dull pain. i hate that man with everything in me. he is embarrasing and he harasses my friends. he freakes out about the smallest things and he wants to control my life. hes got a mental disorder, i know, but the fact is that i really dont care. I dont care that hes sick and that he cant control his actions or words anymore, i just dont care. he doesnt help his case miuch when he gives away my fishing pole and my lures and all of my other fishing stuff to the kid next door! i know it prolly made him really really happy and everything, but there was a few hundred dollars worth of fishing stuff there! My mother is seriously depressed and now suicidal, which isnt good with a full bottle of tylonal/codene3 and a lot of other perscription meds in our kitchen. its not a good thing to have them there for me either particularly because i dont know how much longer i can carry a mentally unable father and a permanently broken down mother to keep this sham of a family together. I'm already falling apart. I hang out with other ppl as much as i possibly can, im not at jessicas house as much any more, but ive been hanging out with lisa and cory a lot lately. its a lot of fun being able to go over there whenever and just hang out. i think im overstaying my welcome tho, she and her mom seem to be getting kinda pissed at seeing me walk in the door almost every day. Ive only seen laura like twice this summer, and neither time was for very long. One highlight that id like to point out was going to see Pirates of the Carribean with lisa, cory, and byron. that was a hell of a movie!! i loved it!! appairently were gonna go see it again sometime, but the guys just wanna play the shooting game after it. ive been talking to jessicas mom about a lot of the crap that has been going on lately, and that seems to help a little bit, tho not as much as id like, because even tho ill talk once in a while, it doenst get rid of the feelings. and now im getting in shit for never being home, but if i am home, i get into just as much shit! i cant do anything right, not that any teenager can seem to be able to do that, but i dont know what to do anymore. I need to get away, but I dont have anywhere to go. Loving life is not possible anymore. i dont think that it has been for quite a while now, i just never realized it till now. And Jon sent me an email like 2 days after i last updated this and basically told me that i was never going to see him or hear from him again. I sent him an email back saying that i at least wanted an explination about that, but i havent gotten an answer yet, and i dont think im going to, but ive been considering emailing him again. when i was talking to byron a little while ago and i mentioned that, he started flipping out on me and saying that i should stay away from jon and not emial him or try to talk to him again because he was prolly a rapist that was going to come and rape me and then kill me and i dont know whether to want to bitch slap byron for being an ass, or wonder y the hell he got so protective all of a sudden, coz he knew about jon a loong time ago...i dont know anymore. ud think that the shit with my family and the crap with jon would make me sad, eh? well all it does is make me....not feel i guess....its not hatred for jon, i still think i love him, and for my father it is hatred...but its not as simple as that...or maybe it is and i just cant see it...all i know is that i havent shed a single tear over either of them and i dont think that ill be able to. i havent cried about losing my friends, and ive been considering going to GCVI, but im not sure about that yet. I havent cried at all about anything other then the season finnally of Dawson's creek, or the occasional sad song that ill hear..but thats not crying about myself. i dont talk to any of my friends about this kind of stuff anymore because they get very bitchy. i dont blame them tho, they have just as many problems and i dont need to add to them. I dont see why im still here because, in all truthfulness, i am the one and only thing keeping my mother from either going crazy and killing herself or, the better alternative, leaving my father, and if it werent for me, she would never have married him in the first place. shes told me this herself a few times. Id like to leave or run away, or just not wake up one morning...i know its terrible to say, but things would really be better off that way...unfortunately, it doesnt look like any of those things are possibilities for my future, so i guess im stuck here.

Back To School I hate those words. They are the epidimy of EVILNESS! owell, i dont go back to skool till the 16th, so wut am i complaining about?? =P well, the end of summer was, shall we say interesting. The very last week was pretty hecktic. i started my riding lessons again, then we all decided (we all being cory lisa byron and me) to go camping, but that had to be postponed, and then they had to go to GCVI to get lisas lil sisters schedual on wednesday, then gramma came here with a bday cake for me!! =D it was yummy! people came back from GCVI for cake and stuff and then we all went for my Bday trail ride!! it was so much fun!! =D =D right away when we got back we left for the trailer. I havent been up there since i was eight years old!!! i cant believe how much i missed it!!! me and lisa were sposed to sleep in the main cabin with my parents and the guyz were sposed to be out in the bunkhouse, but the first night they all got scared, and we were all pissed off at my father (he pulled over every 2 seconds on the way up, turning a 2 hr drive into a 5 and a half hour one!!!!) so we begged and pleaded until we were all allowed to sleep in the bunkhouse. nobody really slept much the first night tho. we left the lanterns all on fairly high and the windows shut coz it was cold, but the fumes from the lamps got me and lisa sick. so its liek 2 in the morning and were all sitting outside because were not feeling good. then we finally went back inside and fell asleep (i think that the smores that we made and all the laffing because 4 hotdogs fell into the fire and my parents didnt end up eating any didnt help our stomachs much...plus laffing at the guys because they were scared shitless to go anywhere, and byron refused to go out of the cabin or away from the fire unless he was clinging onto me and a lantern, hehe) but i hadda get up like an hour later to go to the bathroom, and its like a 5 min walk in the dark to the outhouse because u cant see and its all rocky and slippery and stuff, so i poked everyone to try to get someone to come with me, just for company, and everyone was like friggen dead, so i went by myself, and ppl were surprised that i wasnt scared....but i like grew up out there, i like the woods, even at night!! lol. well anywayz, the next day i got up at like 7 and went to go get my book and some coffee, but coffee wasnt ready yet, so i brought my book back to the bunkhouse (IT WAS ONLY 10 DEGREES OUTSIDE!!=S) and i woke lisa up when i came back inside, then we started talking and woke the boys up (oops!) so cory got up, but byron just grumbled and grabbed my arm and used it as a teddy bear, which didnt work because id prefer to keep my shoulder socket in place, so i hadda climb up onto his bunk and sit there with him till he decided to get up, but i think i fell asleep at one point because i layed down and then cory and lisa were like....being annoying, lol and they woke me up. aroung 11-ish lisa went to the bathroom and came back with the good news that the coffee was ready, so i went back since i was too lazy to get dressed yet, and the rest of them followed soon after, byron being the last one out of bed of course, lol. we had something to eat then went back to get changed (me and lisa did anywayz) and we got out bikes and biked into town...the hill into Wiarton is sooooooo fucking awsome to ride down!!! i LOVE it!!! its really really steep....but it was a long way to get out there, lol. we went down to the docks and saw where i thought we were going fishing, but it turned out that we werent going there, we were going somewhere else instead...the river where my mom caught some huge small-mouth bass out of season, lol. anywho, we also went to a convenience store and bought firecrackers and sparklers, and pop and candy and food. then we biked back to the trailer (cory biked up the hill, me and lisa walked all the way, and byron walked about halfway.) it was a fairly long ride, but we all made it. when we got back it was like 1:30 or 2 in the afternoon i think, maybe a bit later, and mom and dad were back (they went into town too, in the car) and so we had KD for lunch, then we went fishing, then we went swimming at Sauble, then we got Ice Cream and Subs, and we went to the docks to eat them, out where we used to fish, and we fed some ducks and tried fishing there too, but no one caught anything and i was afraid that i was going to hook a duck. (cory hooked a water snake by the river and we gathered quite a crowd of ppl that were fishing to look...he got it in the belly though, trying to bring it closer to see wut kind of snake it was because it wasnt a garter snake. someone thought that it was a water mocason, so he was being really really careful not to get biten...unfortunately, it pissed on him instead and we realized that it was a fox snake instead. his hands REEKED!!) anywayz, we went back home and got the fires going again and made more smores, this time with chocolate that lisa bought at the store, and they turned out a lot better because it was a hersheys cookies and cream bar which is thinner and melts better. we also had chippies and i think cory attempted cooking hotdogs again, but i cant remember. but then i ate too much and i didnt feel well so i went and got a gravol and went back to the cabin (after we put out the fire of course) and then lisa wanted her hair braided, so i did that for her, then cory decided that he didnt feel well, so i took him back to the cabin for a gravol and he got an empity beer bottle aswell, so we got back and we all played spin the bottle for a while...i thought that it was just cory coming up with an inventive way to kiss me (hes been trying all summer) but appairently it was byrons idea? *confused* well anywayz, not long after that we all got into bed, but i couldnt sleep and neither could byron, so he turned on a lamp and i read for a while, but then cory got grouchy, so we turned it off and i fell asleep like, instantly and i slept all night long. we left the windows open a bit too, so no one got sick. next morning byron got cold because cory stole his sleeping bag, so he climbed into my bunk and decided that i was a teddy bear again, and fell back asleep!! lol! we eventually all got up and packed up our stuff and got everything in the car and the truck and ready to go. the drive back was long again, but i slept thru a lot of it because cory was smoothing my eyebrows with him thumb, which my mother used to do when i was little, and it puts me to sleep like that *snaps fingers* we got back to guelph in time for everyone to go home and shower, then we had to wait for laura chan to get here and then we all went and got movies to watch at byrons house for his movie marathon thingie. well, it started out well, the guys got the tv into the basement and we watched Basic, which confused us all, and then we went and moved the tv into the other room after watching 8 Legged Freaks, which i bruised my knuckes during (im terrified of spiders, and when they all come out all at once i started chewing my knuckles) laura and byron went upstairs to warm up some pizza pockets and they were gone for a while...anywayz, lisa was asleep in the other room, so me and cory were watching Candyman, which scares him, lol. so he was slightly clingie because he didnt really remeber the movie, but i did, so i was half warning him about parts that were coming up. after candyman i put in we 3 kings i think and i fell asleep thru part of it...laura and byron having returned like ages before...but when i woke up i really wasnt feeling well, and lisa had given up the bed thing to laura and byron and layed on the matresses in the rec room with me and cory, but then i hadda get up to run to the bathroom coz i thought that i was gonna barf, but i didnt, and when i went back, i was shivering and i couldnt stop...i think i scared cory because he kept telling me to calm down and stop shivering and stuff, so he eventually got up and asked byron where the gravol was, so i took one, and i still wasnt feeling good, but it made me sleep a little bit at least. at about 6:30 when i STILL wasnt feeling well, i called my mom and got her to come pick me up from byrons house. i slept somewhat more at home, but i kept thinking that i was at byrons house, and when my mom came over to wrap the blanket around me, which i didnt want around me, i yelled "cory" thinking that it was him doing it, and my mom thought that i was calling for him =S that woke me up quick enough =S but then everyone came over at about 11 or so to see how i was doing, and my father was a fucking asshole bastard and started yelling at cory and screaming that he knew what cory'd done to me, etc, etc, thinking that he raped me or something and that was a load of bull shit, so cory was yelling back asking what it was that he had done, and it sounded like he was ready to punch my father and that my father was ready to fight back. then lisa stepped in, sounding extreemly pissed off, saying that all we did was watch movies, which was technically true (cept for when we went to the park to light off cherry bombs and laura had a smoke) laura chan was out on the deck and apairently she started crying, and byron was just inside the door, but he didnt say anything at all. they all left because the old retard kicked them out, but my mom followed them to the street and tried to comfort laura, which didnt really work because she ended up crying too. anywayz, when she came back in she started yelling and screaming at my father saying that he didnt know what he was talking about and that that was the last straw, he was terrorizing kids and he should never have accused cory, and hed upset laura, and that he was gonna be outta here and everything. i liked that fight...id like it more if she followed thru on everything because she said that he would be gone in like a week and, guess what, big surprise, hes still here!! He also called the fucking cops to come down!! ugh!!!! i hate that man!!! he said that mom was going crazy and screaming at him and everything and that there was a guy who did something to me. the cop came and he was at the house for like 2 hours, talking to both of my parents, he finally got the story straight from my mom who asked him if we could send him to the homewood or something, but appairently thats not how that works, so the cop eventually left and my mother wouldnt speak to anyone like all day long. well anywayz, i got better that night and went to lisas house for cake and ice cream because they were celebrating lisa's and rachel's bdays that night. i ended up sleeping over because i was there pretty late and i rode my bike to get there. byron was there too, and sometime, the next day i think, we were all on the trampoline and cory went to jump over me, but i moved or something and he landed on my eye and then fell off the trampoline but his foot caught in the pad a bit and he ended up tripping and landing funny on his ankel which broke off part of the bone. so lisas mommy took him to the hospital and they said that if the swelling didnt go down in 3 days he hadda go back and they might have to operate...but he was perfectly fine. he came back the first weekend after skewl started even tho he wasnt really supposed to, and we all went moonlight bowling at woodlawn bowl and i got 3 strikes in a row!!!! =D =D the third one won us a free game, i think i won two or three and lisa got the other one....if i only got 2 then either cory or byron got the last one. butbut yeah. it was SOOOO much fun!!! lol. and it was only my second time EVER bowling!!! =D whee!! *little voice kicks me* dammit! well anywho, yeah...thats about all thats happened really....my life is so uninteresting...im going to kill my father, i forgot to mention that he ripped out my speakers downstairs!!! im hoping that they still work because i finally got my launch up and running again and then the fucking retard decides that the music was too loud and he wont even wait till the end of the song, which is what my mom said i could do, he just stomps in and yells and rips out the speakers and yells some more, so i yelled back and i think i pissed him off pretty badly because he looked like he wanted to hit me. but uhm...yeah....oh the other thing that was weird was that this morning i got my marks thing, cept that all i got was the Virtual Learning Centre Honours Certificate....there was no report card, so i know that my mark is higher then 80 coz i got honours, but i dont know how MUCH higher, lol. well anywayz, this is REALLY long, soo imma go now! Poem... I got bored and was looking around in my old comp and i came up with this poem. It's pretty old, and things have gotten a lot worse in my little world since i wrote this, but owell, its going up anywayz. They see me as though thru a foggy mirror only a shadow of myself. Wear my heart on my sleeve put myself aside for others my feelings collecting dust on the shelf. I cant be what they want me to be though i try i cant live the life they want me to Ill listen to the music i like Ill live how i want ill pass highskewl without setting foot in the skewl. my dad'll call me shit but i wont care ive had enough of this life my friends will leave but i wont care its all on the next roll of the dice. Its all or nothing and the way things are going i dont thinks its all this life screws most ppl but some get off easy while the rest of us crawl no one really cares i know that now it seems so obvious to me it doenst really matter none of it does so the rest of u can skip with glee for all i care cuz it dont matter to me anymore it never will i drift away into my own world its all going black as my blood i spill

Holidays... I was at ma grammas today and saw the family. it was fun. i like being able to see everyone together at the same time for the holidays. its one of the less depressing aspects. one of the more depressing views is realizing how little u mean in the world. lets play a little game. i call it who matters more. k, we'll start with the ppl who are pretty much my best friends. cory and lisa matter more to each other than either to me, so chalk two up for the other side. then theres the guy that i had my heart set on for the longest time and whose now getting married at the ripe old age of 18...who matters more now? obviously not me. prolly never was me to begin with. laura clayton doesnt talk to me anymore, same with nicole and judy and malorie and megan and pretty much all of my old friends, so i guess i dont matter much to them either. come to think of it, it even goes as far as jack. who matters more, me or laura? hmm, lets see, uhh...laura! wow, was that ever hard. my mom cares more about her misery and self pittying denial of happiness and acceptance of depression than she does about me, and even im a traitor. i care more about the fact that no one cares about me than i do about caring about myself. not that that makes any sence whatsoever to anyone but myself. it feels like im never going to find someone for me. anyone i meet online will be either too far away, a rapist, or a backstabbing cheater whose name still makes my heart wrench because of all the promises he made me. whatever happened to coming and visiting me in the summer jon? hmm? and leaving me something really close to u to proove to me that u were comming back? oh wait, i guess i kno the answer to that dont i. brittany happened. u even told me that u wished u had ur virginity back because u wanted it to be with the quote "right person"....do u have any idea how much that hurts? how it tears me up inside? of course not. but then it doesnt matter because im just some kid that lives across the country that actually fell for u and u had fun leading on for a while till u got tired of it. and its funny coz it doesnt even matter if it matters or not because ull never read this anywayz. unless of course i gave u the url, which im not planning on dewing. i havent cried, not for u. and i wont. it just doesnt seem like im ever going to get a chance at like anything.

He's Gone... This afternoon was weird. I'm still shell-shocked. Started being woken up at six in the morning by my father coming into my room and bugging me that i should be up to walk cole to school, even tho i didnt have to take him this morning. he was convinced that i had to take him and that i was an ass for not getting out of bed and going next door. i was gonna get in shit for not taking him and i was going to be in a ton of shit if he had to walk alone, acording to him. this went on for about four hours till ten in the morning when i finally got out of bed because i was sick of it and id heard the mail lady getting father to sign for a package, which was my Sony Atrac3plus, so thats awsome, and i went and got it and disappeared into my room coz jack stayed home from school to keep me company today. of course he didnt want me playing with the walkman because he thought that i was going to get shocked and hurt myself or some such foolishness, so i turned it on and drowned him out for most of the day till i started at my hw. i was talking to jessica online just before mom got home and she was asking me if i was coming over with rob when he got here and i was completely lost, i didnt think that i was going anywhere, not that i knew of anywayz....and so when i asked mom when she got home she told me that yeah shed called sandy and arranged for me and rob to go over, but she wouldnt tell me why, not even give me a clue and it scared me, so i said that i didnt want to go to jessicas house. i dont really know y i didnt wanna go over, but if rob hadnt been there id have been at the park the entire time till mom called me, so i guess jus wandering around was better than being stuck in a house. before we left, father gave me a twenty and said that he wanted ten dollars back because i wanted to get a sub for supper. we went to the park and i played on the munkie bars for a few mins, and then we went over to the dollar store because the batteries that were in my Atrac were old, id had them in my other walkman and they were like dead, so i got new ones and then we went over to subway.....well.... I went to subway, rob went to the dentist office between money mart and joey's coz his aunt works there so he stopped in to say hi to her while i got food. when i was done eating, which took me a while because i got my normal foot-long, we went back across the road to the dollar store because i saw some cool fake nails that i wanted, hehe. i should have gone into the other dollar store too, DOH!! hindsights twenty twenty tho. i can go another day. anywayz, we were wandering around near the doors when mom called and said that we could come home now and shed explain but that was all shed say on the fone. so walked back home again and in the door and mom was on the fone, so me and rob went into my room. like ten mins later mom told me to come here and she told me that theyd taken my father to the Homewood. its only really temporary there, until we can find a suitible permanent place, but hes out of the house now. mom started crying and said shed done it for me because she wanted me to be okay. the people that she was talking to were frightened that i was going to really piss him off one of these times and that he was going to hurt me. or that he was going to do something foolish like take the truck and then other people would have gotten hurt. and she started crying harder because she said that hed driven david away, she didnt need him driving another one of her babies away, that had been her biggest fear. and at that point i was crying too and rob came around the corner and left again but i guess he was more uncomfortable in my room alone than he was out with the crying chicks, so he came back and gave us both a hugg and when mom told him that the police officer that had come had barely fit thru our livingroom doorway, he generally lightened the mood by pretending to be that big, but he jumped too high once and actually did hit his head pretty good. we ended up just basically watching TV....dave came over and ordered us all pizza, of which i only had two slices and am now supremely full because of the sub i had before aswell. the only person that i told about it was jack and yeah, he offered to listen if i wanted to talk about it, and i dunno, theres not much to say really, he was there when i left and he wasnt there when i got back, and i didnt even break his twenty so i was sposed to give it back to him....i dunno, jus irrational thoughts that make no sence really....im not as happy as i thought that id be...i dont know what i feel really. jack was asking me if i was ok and how i was doing and everything but i really dont know how i am. i wasnt expecting this for another like month or more, even up to a couple years. im like...numb was how he put it. i havent decided how i need to feel about this yet. its taking a while just for the news to sink in, i mean, mom told me at 5:30 or so and its now 1 in the morning and i still dont really believe it. i dont know whether to jump for joy or break down again. y do things have to be so confusing? i thought that things would clear up when this was all over and he was gone, but it hasnt. ttyl, buh byez.

Pressure Before I get down to actually entering something here, let me just say that my show was awsome! I rode Chester and I got a 4th in equitation, a 1st in jumping!!!!!, and a 4th in the last jumping class. I was sooo happy that i got the first and chester was soooo good! the only problem with the equitation was my stirrups were too short, and in the second jumping we took the first fence a little big and he didnt completely get his lead changes, his front legs changed, but not his back. but he was nice and controlled and he had pace but he wasnt running away with me at all, so technically he was going really slow for chester, lol. But yea, all of that's fine and dandy, but its not what i came here to write about. As has been previously mentioned in this blog, my father is now residing in the Homewood. He finally stopped being angry with my mother enough to let her come and visit him. She was going fairly regularly and then she stopped a little and he was freaking out so bad they had to drug him to keep him calm. Appairently he asks for me and about me every time someone goes to see him. Even my brother went...he went before my mom even did. Everyone's so proud of being such a "big" person and going to see him even after all that he put him thru over the years, including driving him out of home at the ripe old age of 16. my grandparents want me to go and see him, and my brothers all want me to. my sister knows why i wont go, she and i had a couple talks at subway before he ever left and she knows what its like to be a daughter instead of a son. but i basically have my entire family after me to be as much of a person as daveid and go and see him because hes asking for me and im going to feel sorry if i dont. well excuse my french, but i dont fucking care if hes asking for me. nor will i ever care. my daddy died a long time ago, and i never got to say goodbye, nothing can change that. the man that lived in my house for 2 years and is now living in the homewood is not my father. they have no idea what it was like living here with him for all that time the way that he was. it was even harder because it was like my daddy was here but it wasnt him, not at all, and hes completely dead now, so what would the point of visiting this stranger be? I hate having all these people making me feel guilty about this. its stupid, if i want to go then ill go, until then, if that day ever comes, they need to back the hell off. i cant even explain to them that i wont go because i hate him, because then theyd think even less of me than they do now. which i dont really need, and they dont know how i can justify that i hate my own father, but its not all that hard really. they just have to call u names for long enough and put u down enough times that u finally snap and theres no going back to mend that break, its there forever. i dont know, i wish people would just leave me alone and let me get on with my life instead of trying to get me to revisit the past coz u know wut, fuck the past, its behind me, hakuna matatta, etc. And fuck everyone who keeps fucking compairing me.
